n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = set(a)

print(sum(s) - sum(a))

def main():
    n = int(input())
    skills = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    skills.sort()
    i = 0
    j = n - 1
    count = 0
    while i < j:
        if skills[i] == skills[j]:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        elif skills[i] < skills[j]:
            count += skills[j] - skills[i]
            i += 1
        else:
            count += skills[i] - skills[j]
            j -= 1
    print(count)

main()

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()

cnt = 0

for i in range(0, n, 2):
    cnt += a[i+1] - a[i]

print(cnt)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(0, n, 2):
    if a[i] != a[i + 1]:
        ans += a[i + 1] - a[i]

print(ans)
